abstract: Philadelphia Phillies pitcher Cole Hamels throws no-hitter against Chicago Cubs but is likely to be traded away by team anyway.
lead_paragraph: Hamels (6-7) struck out 13, tossing his first career no-hitter in what could be his final start for the Phillies.

headline.main: No-Hitter for Cole Hamels; Trade May Follow
headline.print_headline: No-Hitter for Hamels; Trade May Follow

snippet: Hamels (6-7) struck out 13, tossing his first career no-hitter in what could be his final start for the Phillies.
